Thik ache. Ei assessment er prothom part er jonno, amra sheet ta back and forth dibo. Thik ache, ami ekta table rakhi niyechi, so tumi tar upor likhte paro. half a second part. Ami seta tomader theke sarie niye asbo. Ami kichhu onno parts niye kaj korbo. Thik ache, shonar moto lagche?

truck banana violin green.

correct.
that's good. Dhonnobad. Ami tomay ekta sentence porbo, repeat koro amar por por exactly ami jevabe bollam. A bird can fly into closed windows when it's dark and windy.
A bird can fly into close windows when it's dark and windy.
Dhonnobad. Ekhn ami tomay arekta sentence porbo repeat koro amar por por exactly ami jevabe bollam. The caring grandmother sent groceries over a week ago.
